dcterms:creator: W. F. Long
dcterms:description: A novel Sequential Social Dilemma that models the State of Nature by introducing Hobbesian mechanisms such as opponent learning awareness and majoritarian voting, leading to the establishment of a Sovereign.
dcterms:title: Civilization Game

dcterms:creator: J. Z. Leibo
V. Zambaldi
M. Lanctot
J. Marecki
T. Graepel
dcterms:description: A game where players can choose to capture prey alone or capture together with other players to obtain an extra bonus, exposing tensions between immediate short-term rewards and optimal cooperative behavior.
dcterms:title: Wolfpack Game

dcterms:creator: J. Z. Leibo
V. Zambaldi
M. Lanctot
J. Marecki
T. Graepel
dcterms:description: A game where players choose between shooting other players which temporarily disables them and gathering apples located around a grid-like map, exposing tensions between immediate short-term rewards and optimal cooperative behavior.
dcterms:title: Gathering Game

dcterms:creator: B. Skyrms
dcterms:description: A game that illustrates the dynamics of cooperation and defection, where players must decide whether to cooperate for mutual benefit or defect for individual gain.
dcterms:title: Stag Hunt Game

dcterms:creator: A. Peysakhovich
A. Lerer
dcterms:description: A game that explores the dynamics of cooperation and defection in a multi-agent setting, focusing on the evolution of social structures.
dcterms:title: Harvest Game

dcterms:creator: A. Peysakhovich
A. Lerer
dcterms:description: A game that examines the dynamics of cooperation and defection in a multi-agent setting, focusing on the evolution of social structures.
dcterms:title: Escalation Game

dcterms:creator: H. Jhuang
J. Gall
S. ZufÔ¨Å
C. Schmid
M. J. Black
dcterms:description: A dataset aimed at understanding action recognition through video clips, providing a benchmark for evaluating action recognition algorithms.
dcterms:title: sub-JHMDB Dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: A large dataset containing video clips with 13 joints annotated in all frames, including head, shoulders, elbows, wrists, hips, knees, and ankles.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset
